title: Stock Futures Hover Ahead of Inflation Data
sub_head: Treasury yields rise as investors await inflation data
body:
U.S. stock futures were treading water Wednesday and Treasury yields rose for the seventh day in a row ahead of closely watched inflation data for July.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 ticked down 0.1%, pointing to the broad market benchmark opening lower after notching a record Tuesday. Contracts tied to the Nasdaq-100 fell 0.3% and futures linked to the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose less than 0.1%.
Before the U.S. opening bell, Coinbase Global shares added 2.7% after the cryptocurrency exchange posted growing revenue and usage. They were also boosted by a rally in cryptocurrencies, which powered ahead early Wednesday.
Bitcoin edged up 1.3% from its 5 p.m. ET level Tuesday to $46,203.42, on track for its third consecutive day of gains. Ether, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market value, rose 2.4%.
Shares of website design platform Wix.com fell more than 8% after the company said it saw a mild slowdown in the creation of new web presences.
